channel.title: Book Of Ezekiel on ✟ Christian Writings ✟
channel.description: Recent content in Book Of Ezekiel on ✟ Christian Writings ✟

item.title: Ezekiel 1
item.description: v1 Now in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I was among the captives by the river Chebar, the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.

item.title: Ezekiel 2
item.description: v1 He said to me, “Son of man, stand on your feet, and I will speak with you.

item.title: Ezekiel 3
item.description: v1 He said to me, “Son of man, eat what you find.

item.title: Ezekiel 4
item.description: v1 “You also, son of man, take a tile, and lay it before yourself, and portray on it a city, even Jerusalem.

item.title: Ezekiel 5
item.description: v1 “You, son of man, take a sharp sword. You shall take it as a barber’s razor to yourself, and shall cause it to pass over your head and over your beard.

item.title: Ezekiel 6
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, set your face toward the mountains of Israel, and prophesy to them,

item.title: Ezekiel 7
item.description: v1 Moreover Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “You, son of man, the Lord Yahweh says to the land of Israel, ‘An end!

item.title: Ezekiel 8
item.description: v1 In the sixth year, in the sixth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I sat in my house, and the elders of Judah sat before me, the Lord Yahweh’s hand fell on me there.

item.title: Ezekiel 9
item.description: v1 Then he cried in my ears with a loud voice, saying, “Cause those who are in charge of the city to draw near, each man with his destroying weapon in his hand.

item.title: Ezekiel 10
item.description: v1 Then I looked, and see, in the expanse that was over the head of the cherubim there appeared above them as it were a sapphire stone, as the appearance of the likeness of a throne.

item.title: Ezekiel 11
item.description: v1 Moreover the Spirit lifted me up, and brought me to the east gate of Yahweh’s house, which looks eastward.

item.title: Ezekiel 12
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word also came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, you dwell in the middle of the rebellious house, who have eyes to see, and don’t see, who have ears to hear, and don’t hear; for they are a rebellious house.

item.title: Ezekiel 13
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel who prophesy, and say to those who prophesy out of their own heart, ‘Hear Yahweh’s word:

item.title: Ezekiel 14
item.description: v1 Then some of the elders of Israel came to me, and sat before me.

item.title: Ezekiel 15
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, what is the vine tree more than any tree, the vine-branch which is among the trees of the forest?

item.title: Ezekiel 16
item.description: v1 Again Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, cause Jerusalem to know her abominations;

item.title: Ezekiel 17
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, tell a riddle, and speak a parable to the house of Israel;

item.title: Ezekiel 18
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me again, saying, v2 “What do you mean, that you use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, ‘The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children’s teeth are set on edge’?

item.title: Ezekiel 19
item.description: v1 “Moreover, take up a lamentation for the princes of Israel,

item.title: Ezekiel 20
item.description: v1 In the seventh year, in the fifth month, the tenth day of the month, some of the elders of Israel came to inquire of Yahweh, and sat before me.

item.title: Ezekiel 21
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, set your face toward Jerusalem, and preach toward the sanctuaries, and prophesy against the land of Israel.

item.title: Ezekiel 22
item.description: v1 Moreover Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “You, son of man, will you judge?

item.title: Ezekiel 23
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came again to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, there were two women, the daughters of one mother.

item.title: Ezekiel 24
item.description: v1 Again, in the ninth year, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, Yahweh’s word came to me, saying,

item.title: Ezekiel 25
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, set your face toward the children of Ammon, and prophesy against them.

item.title: Ezekiel 26
item.description: v1 In the eleventh year, in the first of the month, Yahweh’s word came to me, saying,

item.title: Ezekiel 27
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came again to me, saying, v2 “You, son of man, take up a lamentation over Tyre;

item.title: Ezekiel 28
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came again to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, tell the prince of Tyre, ‘The Lord Yahweh says: “Because your heart is lifted up, and you have said, ‘I am a god, I sit in the seat of God, in the middle of the seas;’ yet you are man, and not God, though you set your heart as the heart of God–

item.title: Ezekiel 29
item.description: v1 In the tenth year, in the tenth month, on the twelfth day of the month, Yahweh’s word came to me, saying,

item.title: Ezekiel 30
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came again to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, prophesy, and say, ‘The Lord Yahweh says: “Wail, ‘Alas for the day!

item.title: Ezekiel 31
item.description: v1 In the eleventh year, in the third month, in the first day of the month, Yahweh’s word came to me, saying,

item.title: Ezekiel 32
item.description: v1 In the twelfth year, in the twelfth month, in the first day of the month, “Yahweh’s word came to me, saying,

item.title: Ezekiel 33
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, speak to the children of your people, and tell them, ‘When I bring the sword on a land, and the people of the land take a man from among them, and set him for their watchman;

item.title: Ezekiel 34
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, prophesy against the shepherds of Israel.

item.title: Ezekiel 35
item.description: v1 Moreover Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, set your face against Mount Seir, and prophesy against it,

item.title: Ezekiel 36
item.description: v1 You, son of man, prophesy to the mountains of Israel, and say, “You mountains of Israel, hear Yahweh’s word.

item.title: Ezekiel 37
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s hand was on me, and he brought me out in Yahweh’s Spirit, and set me down in the middle of the valley; and it was full of bones.

item.title: Ezekiel 38
item.description: v1 Yahweh’s word came to me, saying, v2 “Son of man, set your face toward Gog, of the land of Magog, the prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal, and prophesy against him,

item.title: Ezekiel 39
item.description: v1 “You, son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, ‘The Lord Yahweh says: “Behold, I am against you, Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal.

item.title: Ezekiel 40
item.description: v1 In the twenty-fifth year of our captivity, in the beginning of the year, in the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after the city was struck, in the same day, Yahweh’s hand was on me, and he brought me there.

item.title: Ezekiel 41
item.description: v1 He brought me to the temple, and measured the posts, six cubits wide on the one side, and six cubits wide on the other side, which was the width of the tent.

item.title: Ezekiel 42
item.description: v1 Then he brought me out into the outer court, the way toward the north.

item.title: Ezekiel 43
item.description: v1 Afterward he brought me to the gate, even the gate that looks toward the east.

item.title: Ezekiel 44
item.description: v1 Then he brought me back by the way of the outer gate of the sanctuary, which looks toward the east; and it was shut.

item.title: Ezekiel 45
item.description: v1 “’“Moreover, when you divide by lot the land for inheritance, you shall offer an offering to Yahweh, a holy portion of the land.

item.title: Ezekiel 46
item.description: v1 “‘The Lord Yahweh says: “The gate of the inner court that looks toward the east shall be shut the six working days; but on the Sabbath day it shall be opened, and on the day of the new moon it shall be opened.

item.title: Ezekiel 47
item.description: v1 He brought me back to the door of the house; and behold, waters flowed out from under the threshold of the house eastward, for the front of the house faced toward the east.

item.title: Ezekiel 48
item.description: v1 “Now these are the names of the tribes: From the north end, beside the way of Hethlon to the entrance of Hamath, Hazar Enan at the border of Damascus, northward beside Hamath (and they shall have their sides east and west), Dan, one portion.
